website_summaries.verdict: A great student trombone at a price that won't break the budget.
pros: Comes with a nice case and a tuner
Perfect price for a young player just starting out
cons: Does not come with a cleaning snake

customer_reviews.title: I feel this horn is a great bargain. All I want now is to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an 80 year old ex trombone player who has not played since 1954 high school band when I had a Frank Holton trombone which got lost and I wanted to see if I could still play. I feel this horn is a great bargain. All I want now is to get my lip back where it used to be when I used to be first chair solo pep band player. I am extremely happy with this horn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a student.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son solely because of the price. This is my son's first year in band. The local rental company wanted $48/month and a one year contract. So I turned to Amazon for other options. Even though i got this because of price it has worked out great. My son had no complaints and loves it. His music teacher was so impressed he bought one to have on hand in the class room.
customer_reviews.author: Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Horn in my opinion as a band director.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good horn especially considering the price. I purchased these for my entire trombone section who will use them for both concert and marching band and I am very pleased.It is hard purchasing affordable instruments because many of the discount brands aren't worth it! However, this is one of those rare occasions where value + quality coincide and make a great product. Will be purchasing more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Band Guy

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the students, but broken fast.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter play this for her school band. She is totally satisfied and band-teacher said this is more than she can expect for beginners...well after while, she is not a beginner any more tho. She still play this Trombone and it works as a new one. Updated on 02/06/19 : the handle you push and pull is malfunctioning after using for 3~4 months. My daughter is not playing rough, and always cares this instrument very preciously with her school band master. My daughter had to rent the trombone to play in All-County band, so sad...
customer_reviews.author: shangus

customer_reviews.title: Good for $80
customer_reviews.text: For a used $80 Amazon instrument, I'm impressed. It works, is scratch and dent free, and sounds good. Though, not surprising, the slide was assembled backwards, the instrument came with trumpet valve oil, which is not going to work well for a trombone slide, and the case doesn't seem to fit the slide quite right. Every time I close it, the spit valve is smashed against the hard opposite side of the case. There is no cut-out for it. My solution is to open the flap for the mouthpiece compartment and close it that way, keeping the mouthpiece in the outside pocket. I don't want to damage the spit valve spring over time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This trombone is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This trombone is a great value for the price but do not expect the quality of name brand trombone that might cost you $800 or more. Good for a beginner or someone that use to play trombone and just wants to play occasionally now. For the money you're paying here, you're getting a very nice musical instrument. It's exactly what I wanted and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Roddick

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for school band
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is not fit to be used for students learning how to play for the first time. The kids band teacher advised us to return as the sound quality and overall quality of the instrument is of such poor quality "You're better off buying a used one off eBay".
customer_reviews.author: George Hursh

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty impressed with this instrument
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed with this instrument. The slide action is very good after the initial lube and break in. Make sure to have some valve oil for the trigger valve as It tends to be a bit sticky at first.I highly recommend this trombone for a high school or college musician.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Williams

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: My maestro is a 6th grader, this is his 2nd year of playing. Got this because I’m a mean dad, he played an entire year on a used trombone, now he has a shiny new one. Another plus is he doesn’t have to haul it to and from school, he practices on his old one at home. It’s a Conn and both play almost identical, now that they are both tuned. Anyway 2 months of him playing and it’s still operates perfectly. His band teacher is also happy with this trombone. Three of the kids in his class have this same trombone and all are having good luck with them
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect instrument for our 10 year old beginner. We didn't want to sink a lot of money into a high-end rental from the local music store and this fit the bill. The instrument is good quality and her teacher thinks it's great as well. Once she started playing we discovered there was a crack in the cork in the water valve, so we contacted the seller, KK Music Store and they immediately sent us a whole new slide at no extra charge. Great customer service from them in addition to a great product.
customer_reviews.author: dealscavenger

customer_reviews.title: Great to start off with!
customer_reviews.text: Just starting off on Trombone. It's a great instrument to play around on and learn with. After playing woodwind instruments my whole life I have really enjoyed playing on this trombone. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of them and this one is probably the best of the group
customer_reviews.text: I was once a professional trombone player and I have a few pro model horns. My son recently took up the trombone and I saw that there were several very inexpensive models for sale now. I bought 3 of them and this one is probably the best of the group. The horn is in tune and the slide is very true. I can get it as smooth as my pro horns. It has a bright sound which is great for students. I wish they had this horn when I was a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner trombone
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing this instrument since last year. His band teacher cant believe I bought it on Amazon. The tone and sound it gives is just as good as one of the expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son who is in eighth grade band. He picked it on the first day it arrived and hasn’t looked back. He qualified for all county, all region and all state band. He also scored a 30/30 in solo ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Martin

customer_reviews.title: but we are very happy so far and the slide works easily
customer_reviews.text: We were worried that it would be an inferior quality instrument based on the price, but we are very happy so far and the slide works easily. My 10 year old is able to produce good, consistent notes and it is a perfect instrument for his first year of band in elementary school. He loves that it's brass and it came with everything we needed and even a tuner! (which we are using for my daughter's cello)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument!
customer_reviews.text: My son is in Jazz as well as senior brass band and he is amazed at how well this instrument has held up with daily use. The price was amazing and we'd buy one again. My son has perfect pitch so if it couldn't hold the note he'd not be happy but it's still sounding amazing
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a wonderful trombone. My 10 year old son started band and to rent one was hundreds of dollars. Which Is ridiculous, especially since I was unsure if he would stick with it. This is a great trombone and I highly recommend it! Great case and accessories too!
customer_reviews.author: B & Z

customer_reviews.title: Chrome Flakes Off The Slide Tubes
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when, at just over one year of use, the chrome started coming off the slide tubes in significant amounts. I have quite a bit of experience with trombones, and have never seen this happen before. I know this is a "cheap" trombone, but a different brand bought for my older kid did not have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: KS80537

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely LOVES this. He was so excited when it came. ***UPDATE*** I highly recommend this not just for the price but for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: LeonardBoizMom0203

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but functional, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It would be hard to give this less than 3 stars because it’s quite an achievement to produce a functional trombone for this price. Unfortunately the slide doesn’t move nearly as effortlessly as it should, and makes an audible rasping noise. I bought this trombone as a beater instrument to take to places where I don’t want to be concerned about damaging an expensive one (ie: burning man); for that purpose it’s completely adequate. If you’re a beginner looking to get started with trombone, I’d suggest going for something a bit higher quality or you may be frustrated and quit before you get good at it.
customer_reviews.author: R F

customer_reviews.title: Anyone reading this message Get ready for good news. This trombone was built very well
customer_reviews.text: Anyone reading this message Get ready for good news. This trombone was built very well. Yes!!! finally quality control Whoever designed this trombone was able to find a way to make it right without making the price to high. Rigid slide and square it's all good. No junk here :))
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Quality is fair at best get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, after about 6 weeks slide began to bind and metal on metal grinding. The shop guy said it was watpef and low quality material. Waste of money as it was then two weeks past return date. I now have to buy another horn after spending almost 100 on this one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great trombone
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing trombone since 1978 and needed a new trombone which was reasonable in price. I used to own a $3300 trombone, but had to sell it to pay rent. So, I was not sure how this horn was going to sound. I just received it today. It plays well, and is of good quality, and for just $200. I am really happy with this product. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is cheap and I am just learning to play. But, no, it is not a great instrument. It is hard to get a good sound out of it. I do not regret my purchase since I did not want to pay 2 to 3 times more than what I paid for a decent instrument, but, I do wish I had a decent instrument. If I stick with the trombone, maybe I'll get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nesselroth

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson needed a second trombone for practice at home so he didn’t have to cart one to and from school everyday. His first trombone was a very well known brand so I was a little hesitant about this one. He loved it so much he used this one for his band concert!!!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: The quality is better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with my trombone purchase! As a trombone player a couple of decades ago in school, a friend asked me to try to play again for a Christmas event & loaned me a old beaten horn - I enjoyed that 3 week challenge so much I wanted to buy my own, but didn’t have much of a budget. This model has everything it promised & is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: slnowrkp

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Sounds Good, Like the Case
customer_reviews.text: If he gets serious about trombone in the future I might buy a more expensive one, but this is perfect for my Jr. High student. Have a kid starting band? I recommend this instrument!
customer_reviews.author: NaseT

customer_reviews.title: Great item and price!
customer_reviews.text: This trombone is fantastic. We bought it for our daughter who is a beginner at playing music. It comes with everything you need to be successful. The price is great. From her district we would have paid $90 to rent it for a year but we bought this for a little bit more!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Music to my Ears..
customer_reviews.text: I brought this trombone for my 10 year old son. He is in the band at school. Very affordable as well as more than expected for the price as far as sound. Sounds really awesome sauce..My son is very pleased and so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Glandenera F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good clone but clearly is not designed well. Played trombone for a decade. The slide is not right. It scratches even after a fresh lube, and feels cheap. If you can get past nails on a chalkboard sounds while playing go for it. I can see why my old Yamaha was $900+. Also the tuner it comes with doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Beats renting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sixth grader. It beats the hell out of monthly rental. For the price I could replace this instrument 10 times over before I pay off the rental.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: It's as expected really. Good for middle schoolers or entry level high schoolers on a budget until can upgrade. Had to clean out the rotor and the slide to get them to move freely. With some grease then worked find with little noise. Used it to learn trombone until I got a Bach 50BO. This is a very large bore trombone practically making it a bass trombone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument!! Great quality!!My daughter is a first time player and loves this trombone and the case. She carry’s the instrument like a backpack thanks to the straps on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jenzalooza

customer_reviews.title: Instrument damaged and after 3 months had to replace spit valve
customer_reviews.text: Bought a trombone for our son’s first year of band in September. One side of slide came bent and has a lot of friction when played. Can’t afford another trombone, so our son has to play with a faulty instrument. Also, after 3 months of playing, the spit valve had to be replaced. Was hoping for a better quality instrument for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it for any parent getting an upgraded trombone!
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument for advanced marching band member. My child was very exited to tune it and be able to play it in this years marching band season. I would buy this product all over again. It was well packaged for shipment and protected. Was not sure about the case when ordering. But love the case! Easy strap for child that plays two instruments and music. I would strongly recommend this product to any parent that is getting their child an upgraded trombone!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, great sound
customer_reviews.text: daughter started trombone classes, didnt want to pay too much to start with, shes been having lessons for quite some time now and got quite good, so I asked her teacher if it was worth buying something more expensive he said no the quality of this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mick B

customer_reviews.title: The sound was ok and great for a student if they had built it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year and it busted so badly we had to buy a new trombone- the welds are not strong according to the repair guy and so it weakened other joints and busted. The sound was ok and great for a student if they had built it better
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: She had it for three years and it was great no problems
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sign up for band in middle school and I wasn't ready to invest a lot on a instrument that she wasn't going to play for a long period . She had it for three years and it was great no problems. It's great as a kids starter instrument. But had to get a more expensive one for high school
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but only lasted a few days before problems started
customer_reviews.text: Bought for school band after 1 week got a call from band teacher saying it was squeaking wouldn't slide even after adding oil she thought something inside was broken
customer_reviews.author: coastalvamom3

customer_reviews.title: it is still playable and and has a great sound. O would buy this again for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake this is a beginners instrument. I purchased this for my daughter who started first year band. Her only complaint is the slide is not smooth. I have oiled it well and it is still a smidge to rough. It is not a huge issue, it is still playable and and has a great sound. O would buy this again for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeard

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for cheaper option but it make grindy noise
customer_reviews.text: Makes grindy noise on slide but we use slide cream (not grease) and it helps. Have to do it very frequently as the noise never fully goes away. Grateful for a cheaper option though.
customer_reviews.author: dontusuallyleavereviews

customer_reviews.title: Beginners instrument
customer_reviews.text: This trombone is great for beginners. It is lightweight and easy for my son to carry. He is 11 and weighs 70lbs. The slide is good once it is oiled!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My son had an instrument at school and was trying to lug it home and back each day. Sooo helpful to have one that stays home.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Litton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: After only 5 weeks the slide on the Mendini trombone is rusted & music teacher says to return it. It has a scratchy sound. It has been properly cleaned & oiled but still rusty & sounds bad. I will be returning to manufacture Cecillio. Very disappointed. Now my granddaughter can’t Practice or play in her concert unless we get a replacement very soon
customer_reviews.author: MARY JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Our band teacher was a little hesitant with the instruments quality however if you take good care of it and lubricate regularly
customer_reviews.text: My son started playing this past summer with this instrument. Our band teacher was a little hesitant with the instruments quality however if you take good care of it and lubricate regularly, we’ve had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with the product and I'm happy we didn't break ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wanted to take up the Trombone and was looking at plastic ones. This Trombone was equal in price and is exactly what she needed to get started on the instrument. She is very happy with the product and I'm happy we didn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: get the rental, dont do it parents...
customer_reviews.text: This instrument seemed like a great alternative to renting. Long story short. The instrument separated. I took pictures. Filed a claim with KK music. KK music had me send the pictures.. Had me pay 60+ dollars to ship it to them. Ultimately for them to say they can't repair or replace it. So much for a warranty. Beware, it's not even a quality product. Get a rental and avoid cheap amazon products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mouth piece
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase a different mouth piece. The mouth piece didn't work very well. Product good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Lardie

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficiency
customer_reviews.text: My child has band and has been using this for the past few months, and so far it's been standing up to the test of time! Although it can be a little bulky and awkward to carry at tumes and the sound quality could be better, it's pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chen s.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty good. My 7th grader has done a good job of being careful with it and it's held up very well
customer_reviews.author: KWC

customer_reviews.title: A Great Starter Instrument
customer_reviews.text: The trombone was a pick-up and play experience for my youthful Grandson. He was immediately enthused and glad to have one to call his own. It's an "Important" factor to a young musically inclined child.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Livera

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good horn
customer_reviews.text: Good horn for the price. Slide is not real smooth and simply oiling it doesn't seem to be working. Plan to upgrade to using some Yamaha Trombone Slide oil and smoothing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for high schooler
customer_reviews.text: My grand son was thrilled with his horn. Played it in Christmas program at school sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: e  ntwk

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. A good trombone for practice or for situations where you do not want to use you main instrument.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: The band teacher says it's decent. So thats good enough for 6th grade. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lynn Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Great trombone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great trombone for beginners, as a trumpet player for 5 years i can say its a good trombone for anyone starting off, a little heavier than standard trombones weigh but plays well, kust remember to lubricate the slides after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made instrument
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made instrument. Plays nice. I didn't want an expensive instrument for while I'm away from home and this was better than I had expected. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: MENDING-MTB TROMBONE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instrument for my granddaughter who lives in Georgia. She needed it for her music class at her school. She is so very pleased with this item. She is doing extra time to learn how to play it to her best. She got a B grade in her music class. She is shooting to get an A for her next semester.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy/rasp slide
customer_reviews.text: Like others have reported, the slide was not the same as a higher quality trombone. It was very scratchy/raspy, which was noticeable when played. Working with Amazon/store to replace and if they are all like that, or whether this was just a bad one. Similarities with other reviews would indicate a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: good pitch, easy to tune
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old son to begin lessons. I played trombone for over 15 years, and I can see no difference in quality between my much more expensive instrument and this one. At 1/8 the cost of the used ones that were being pushed at his school. The sound is clear, good pitch, easy to tune. Slide moves easily. There is no difference besides brand. HIGHLY recommend for anyone looking to buy either a first instrument, or as a replacement. I will definitely be choosing Mendini in the future for my other 6 kids musical needs. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren french

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to play in marching band. He has a Bach for concerts. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: BourneUltimatum

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My son plays trombone for the 2nd year. It didn't work well for him. Sound quality is poor. We couldn't tune it properly. I don't recommend this product even for beginners. We missed the return deadline and wasted $200.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal Zangi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful instrument and it was the hit of the total presents under the tree. The case et al are a wonderful start to playing this instrument...
customer_reviews.author: Meremebjo

customer_reviews.title: ... and instrument fell out and now doesn’t work right poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Junk case wouldn’t close right and instrument fell out and now doesn’t work right poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: For beginners or someone like me who needed to get a new instrument for ...
customer_reviews.text: For beginners or someone like me who needed to get a new instrument for church playing. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner instrument
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the slide makes a scratching noise, even though it is well oiled.
customer_reviews.author: Nate V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great present! Love it. It has everything you need as a beginner! My son was ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Lvesteph

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful sound and color
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this trombone!! It has a very beautiful sound, only thing is they provided the wrong oil they gave me trumpet valve oil not trombone slide oil, other than that very beautiful sound and the tuner works great!!
customer_reviews.author: ursula hubbell

customer_reviews.title: cheap and works
customer_reviews.text: great starter horn for a student. son is in 6th grade and going to use this.
customer_reviews.author: dorkthrone

customer_reviews.title: Good item for price
customer_reviews.text: Good item for price. Excellent tone using included 12C mouthpiece. No visible blemishes and slight operated smoothly. For how cheap this instrument is I was surprised at how well it performs. Definitely recommend for beginning students.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H Dupuy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nice price
customer_reviews.text: Really great as a beginner instrument for my 11 year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best bang for your buck purchases I've ever made i would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: The Landon's

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up so far
customer_reviews.text: Been over a month and it is going strong and no notes from the band teachers asking me to invest in a better one. No problem with this one. (NOTE - 6th grade band)
customer_reviews.author: Epic Riley!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase for beginner, lasted a while. Got dented due to boys being a little rough.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this trombone!
customer_reviews.text: Believe me, I read all of the reviews for all of the trombones and thought this one would be adequate for my 13 year old son. He did not care how or why I elected this one, he was not going to be happy unless it was perfect for him and his band teacher said it was nice...well, he LOVES it and his teacher said it was a nice instrument, so I think it is great! (I personally do not play, so cannot give any additional insight :))
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Ok for beginner get maybe a year+ before having to upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 11/12yr old starting out. The slide is very loose. Did OK first school year, this year music teacher has had to make some adjustments. The case is horrible, falling apart and instrument is not very secure, can hear it moving/rattling.
customer_reviews.author: MyCat8Toto

customer_reviews.title: Great for transitioning to f trigger.
customer_reviews.text: Before thank giving my trombone broke. I had a chair test after break. Panicing i ordered this because i considered this would last me up to after high school. It plays very well. The f trigger makes it easy to get to notes without moving the slide too much. The slide oil sucks. Its just trumpet valve oil. But other than that no air leaks good tome if you try. Get it if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Flannagan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for experienced players
customer_reviews.text: My sons in middle school and it’s a good starter trombone. I suggest getting a better quality one if your child is more experienced with the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bounlangsy

customer_reviews.title: Cant believe this is a student instrument!!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually amazing I got this because I wanted to learn a new instrument for jazz and got it because of its price and I'm amazed at the quality great for any purpose other than professional playing I guess
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: My son is so in love with his trombone
customer_reviews.text: My son is so in love with his trombone. I couldn't have chosen any better instrument and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's what to be expected. My son really enjoys ...
customer_reviews.text: It's what to be expected. My son really enjoys practicing and playing his trombone. So I have nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: Shequyta Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality. Smelly.
customer_reviews.text: My son says it smells horrible when he plays. Has a gurgly sound when he plays like there is spit in it even when there isnt.. Not great sound quality.. Tighteners dont work all the way. Parts still move while playing . should be tight
customer_reviews.author: wendy jackson

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: poor quality.. bought this instrument last year for my daughter and it broke after few months. It can't be fixed. Had to buy another one..
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Dodevska

customer_reviews.title: Awesome instrument
customer_reviews.text: Awesome instrument. This thing workslike a charm. I'm not playing for 10 different bands at once so a super high end trombone wouldn't be for me and this one fits my needs perfectly. It plays it slides and it's got a case.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The trigger works well. Tone quality is good. Works well for my band
customer_reviews.author: John Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it so far. Way better than going to a music store and buying or renting a 30 year old tarnished,dented,smelly $350 used instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very good instrument for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine instrument for a beginner. I bought it for my grandson who plays in the school band and he loves it. His teacher also told him it was a nice instrument. I would recommend it to anyone, especially a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Capozzi

customer_reviews.title: and later teacher found out that "Slide is releasing the rust" hence slide is not easy to move front and back
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for a 5th grade Kid. All went well for first 4 class, and later teacher found out that "Slide is releasing the rust" hence slide is not easy to move front and back, as it get stuck for few seconds. Apart from this the instrument looks OK. The Case is also good. Refer attached screen shots, to see the difference between the left side pipe (which is rusted - see brown areas) and the right side pipe which is not rusted (no brown areas) for now. But the right side may also develop rust later date. I would request supplier to replenish the slide.
customer_reviews.author: SATHYANARAYANA

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked this one
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I know next to nothing about these, but I heard about a child who had theirs stolen and had no way to get a replacement. I purchased this and donated it to her and from what I have heard, it is far better than her old one and she couldn't be more happy. So to that I say I made a good purchase. If I find anything else out later, I will update this as I do all my reviews
customer_reviews.author: Gaigemc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and looks like it will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Always Avid

customer_reviews.title: Works great, he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year olds band class. Works great, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginner. My advanced student had to buy a professional instrument. We kept this one though for a beginning band student and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: But it was WAY better quality than what was expected
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's inexpensive. But it was WAY better quality than what was expected. Purchased this for six-grader in their 3rd year in band. It sounds great, and case is light and very nice quality. And yes, slide needs to be greased prior to playing. Tuning is fine, and easy to do (as it should be tuned every time it is pulled out of case to play, like every other trombone). All-in-all a great purchase for a student instrument.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Light fix
customer_reviews.text: At first the slide was super slow and dragged but some work with slide oil and grease and was like new. Played well ever since then.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Patterson

customer_reviews.title: There is no tuning adjustment
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is a great student instrument. It sounds very good.
customer_reviews.author: C W.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a present for my brother he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my brother he played it for band all of 2016 and we had no issues with it he will continue using it for next school year of 2017. This istrument is overwell worth its price and i wouldnt recxomend any other one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Great Horn For A Student Or A Jazz Musician
customer_reviews.text: I Love The Nickel Coating On The Horn And The Fact That Is A BFlat Tenor, The Tuning And The Full Sound Is Also Great
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son love it. He said this is just right. That it came with everything he wanted. I got him this for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly king

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly and perfect condition. Very light compared to his rental
customer_reviews.text: My son loves, loves, loves his new trombone. Arrived very quickly and perfect condition. Very light compared to his rental, he was relieved not to have such a heavy trombone. This is a great student trombone for a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this trombone. It was purchased for my 12 year old son because the school only had really beat up instruments. He absolutely loves it and it sounds a world of difference better than the older instruments he was using. The silver is a nice touch also. This is a very nice instrument that I would highly recommend. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Mendini by Cecilio Bb Tenor Slide Trombone, Gold Lacquered, 1 Year Warranty, Tuner, Pocketbook and More, MTB-L
product_meta.description: Color:Gold + TunerMendini by Cecilio trombones are great for students or beginners. Its excellent slide action allows for smooth note changes in all registers, while its small bore makes it the ideal instrument for a beginning student or jazz musician. This package includes a silver plated mouthpiece, a nylon covered hard-shell case with back pack straps for your convenience, a pair of gloves and cleaning cloth. Buy with confidence as it comes with a 1- year warranty against any manufacturer's defects.
feature_bullets: Gold lacquer B Flat tenor slide trombone.
Includes: Cecilio 92-D chromatic tuner, pocketbook, pro-deluxe durable hard case, a pair of white gloves & cleaning cloth
